title: Ghost Recon: Wildlands E3 2016 Trailer - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Colin and Greg breakdown the Ghost Recon: Wildlands E3 2016 Trailer!

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

transcript_chunks.text: E3 2016 is happening kind of funny is going all out with Let's Plays and reaction videos all week long subscribe now at youtube.com/ kind of funny games to not miss a thing what's up everybody welcome to another E3 reaction 2016 kind of funny YouTube go to Twitch do all I'm Greg Miller this is the pride of Long Island colore y it's good to be here with you today good to be here with you Colin Colin we're jumping into a little game called Ghost Recon wildlands officially it's confirmation name Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon right Wild Man uh what did you think we saw it today in action it was the first time since last time looks awesome yeah right uh yeah I think I think this is uh with the exception of South Park probably the most anticipated UB announced UB game that we've uh that we've seen you assume that Far Cry is probably in the mix somewhere deep within the bowels of one of their Studios and I'm certainly going to be excited for that when they show it but we saw this first time last

assume that Far Cry is probably in the mix somewhere deep within the bowels of one of their Studios and I'm certainly going to be excited for that when they show it but we saw this first time last year at E3 um and then I couldn't wrap my head around it showed it it was ATVs I was like what exact is happening it was a weird it was a weird kind of reveal I think they're trying to show the scope of the map this is supposed to be a massive open world by Ubisoft standards uh you know the one thing I was really pleased to hear them say and I really want to believe that this is metric driven is that they you can play the game by yourself they said that out front remember with the division you didn't really know in fact like we they went almost all the way to release until they really confirmed that you can play the division by yourself they're saying this almost a year out from the game's release uh which indicates to me that people are playing the division alone or they're playing other
